dcterms:description: The Fruits-360 dataset contains 81120 images of 120 categories of fruits, where 75% samples are used for training and remaining 25% for testing. The pictures were acquired by filming fruits while being revolved by a motor against a white backdrop, and a Flood fill algorithm was used for background extraction.
dcterms:title: Fruits-360
